remarks.format: ## Remarks 泛型類別是 O (記錄 n) 擷取使用二進位搜尋樹狀架構，其中 n 是在字典中的項目數。The generic class is a binary search tree with O(log n) retrieval, where n is the number of elements in the dictionary. 在這一方面，它是類似於泛型類別。In this respect, it is similar to the generic class. 兩個類別都具有類似的物件模型，且兩者都有 O (記錄 n) 擷取。The two classes have similar object models, and both have O(log n) retrieval. 兩個類別的不同之處是記憶體使用量和速度的插入和移除：Where the two classes differ is in memory use and speed of insertion and removal: - 使用較少的記憶體比。 uses less memory than . - 具有未排序的資料的快速插入和移除作業： O (記錄 n)，而不是領先的。 has faster insertion and removal operations for unsorted data: O(log n) as opposed to O(n) for . - 如果從已排序的資料，會同時填入此清單的速度比。If the list is populated all at once from sorted data, is faster than . 每個索引鍵/值組可以擷取為結構，或為透過非泛型介面。Each key/value pair can be retrieved as a structure, or as a through the nongeneric interface. 只要使用中索引鍵，索引鍵必須是不可變。Keys must be immutable as long as they are used as keys in the . 在每個索引鍵必須是唯一的。Every key in a must be unique. 金鑰不能`null`，但是值可以是，如果型別值`TValue`是參考型別。A key cannot be `null`, but a value can be, if the value type `TValue` is a reference type. 需要執行比較索引鍵比較子實作。 requires a comparer implementation to perform key comparisons. 您可以指定的實作使用建構函式可接受泛型介面`comparer`參數; 如果您未指定，預設 genericcomparer 實作用。You can specify an implementation of the generic interface by using a constructor that accepts a `comparer` parameter; if you do not specify an implementation, the default genericcomparer is used. 如果型別`TKey`實作泛型介面，則預設比較子會使用該實作。If type `TKey` implements the generic interface, the default comparer uses that implementation. `foreach` C# 語言的陳述式 (`for each` c + +`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中) 傳回集合中的項目類型的物件。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) returns an object of the type of the elements in the collection. 因為每個項目是索引鍵/值組，項目型別不是索引鍵的類型或值的類型。Since each element of the is a key/value pair, the element type is not the type of the key or the type of the value. 相反地，項目型別是。Instead, the element type is . 下列程式碼會示範 C#、 c + + 和 Visual Basic 語法。The following code shows C#, C++, and Visual Basic syntax. [!code-cpp[Generic.Dictionary#11](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Dictionary/cpp/source2.cpp#11)] [!code-csharp[Generic.Dictionary#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Dictionary/CS/source2.cs#11)] [!code-vb[Generic.Dictionary#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Dictionary/VB/source2.vb#11)] `foreach`陳述式是列舉值，以允許讀取集合，不寫入包裝函式。The `foreach` statement is a wrapper around the enumerator, which allows only reading from the collection, not writing to it. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立空的 string 索引鍵，並使用具有字串方法，將某些項目。The following code example creates an empty of strings with string keys and uses the method to add some elements. 此範例示範方法會擲回時嘗試加入重複的索引鍵。The example demonstrates that the method throws an when attempting to add a duplicate key. 此範例會使用屬性 （C# 中為索引子） 來擷取值，擊發要求的索引鍵不存在，而且可以取代顯示索引鍵關聯的值時，會擲回。The example uses the property (the indexer in C#) to retrieve values, demonstrating that a is thrown when a requested key is not present, and showing that the value associated with a key can be replaced. 該示例顯示如何使用方法作為更有效的方式來檢索值，如果程序通常必須嘗試不在字典中的鍵值，並且它顯示如何使用方法來測試在調用 方法。The example shows how to use the method as a more efficient way to retrieve values if a program often must try key values that are not in the dictionary, and it shows how to use the method to test whether a key exists before calling the method. 此範例示範如何列舉的索引鍵和值的字典中，以及如何列舉索引鍵和值單獨使用屬性和屬性。The example shows how to enumerate the keys and values in the dictionary and how to enumerate the keys and values alone using the property and the property. 最後，此範例示範方法。Finally, the example demonstrates the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 列舉的目的而言，每個項目是結構，表示值和其索引鍵。For purposes of enumeration, each item is a structure representing a value and its key. `foreach` C# 語言的陳述式 (`for each` c + +`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of enumerators. 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 使用內部的樹狀結構以排序順序維護的字典。The dictionary is maintained in a sorted order using an internal tree. 每個新的項目位於正確的排序位置與維護的排序次序，每當移除項目會調整樹狀目錄。Every new element is positioned at the correct sort position, and the tree is adjusted to maintain the sort order whenever an element is removed. 列舉，會維護排序順序。While enumerating, the sort order is maintained. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 此位置未定義屬性。At this position, the property is undefined. 因此，您必須呼叫方法，以將列舉值前進到第一個項目，再讀取的值集合的。Therefore, you must call the method to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 屬性會傳回相同的項目，直到方法呼叫。The property returns the same element until the method is called. 會將 設定為下一個項目。 sets to the next element. 如果超過集合的列舉值的結尾會位於集合中的最後一個元素之後和傳回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 列舉值位於這個位置上，後續呼叫也會傳回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最後一個呼叫傳回`false`，是未定義。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 您不能再次將 設定為集合的第一個項目；您必須建立新的列舉值執行個體。You cannot set to the first element of the collection again; you must create a new enumerator instance instead. 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果變更集合，例如加入、 修改或刪除項目，列舉程式會永久失效，而且下次呼叫或會擲回。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權，因此，列舉集合內容本質上並不是安全的執行緒程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 命名空間中集合的預設實作未同步處理。Default implementations of collections in the namespace are not synchronized. 這個方法是 O (記錄 n) 運算，其中 n 是計數。This method is an O(log n) operation, where n is count.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會提供可以使用下列 C# 語法存取集合中的特定元素的能力： `myCollection[key]` (`myCollection(key)`在 Visual Basic 中)。This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following C# syntax: `myCollection[key]` (`myCollection(key)` in Visual Basic). 您也可以使用加入新項目，藉由設定機碼值的屬性不存在於; 例如， `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`。You can also use the property to add new elements by setting the value of a key that does not exist in the ; for example, `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`. 不過，如果指定的索引鍵已存在於，設定屬性會覆寫舊的值。However, if the specified key already exists in the , setting the property overwrites the old value. 相反地，方法不會修改現有的項目。In contrast, the method does not modify existing elements. 金鑰不能`null`，但是值可以是，如果型別值`TValue`是參考型別。A key cannot be `null`, but a value can be, if the value type `TValue` is a reference type. C# 語言使用關鍵字來定義索引，而不必實作屬性。The C# language uses the keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 會將 實作為預設屬性，這樣會提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality. 取得這個屬性的值為 O (記錄`n`) 作業; 設定該屬性也是 O (記錄`n`) 作業。Getting the value of this property is an O(log `n`) operation; setting the property is also an O(log `n`) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用屬性 （C# 中為索引子） 來擷取值，擊發要求的索引鍵不存在，而且可以取代顯示索引鍵關聯的值時，會擲回。The following code example uses the property (the indexer in C#) to retrieve values, demonstrating that a is thrown when a requested key is not present, and showing that the value associated with a key can be replaced. 此範例也示範如何使用方法更有效率的方式來擷取值，如果程式通常必須嘗試不在字典中的索引鍵值。The example also shows how to use the method as a more efficient way to retrieve values if a program often must try key values that are not in the dictionary. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空間中集合的預設實作未同步處理。Default implementations of collections in the namespace are not synchronized. 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，可能會造成列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which can cause the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 屬性傳回的物件，可用來同步處理存取具備。The property returns an object that can be used to synchronize access to the . 同步處理的所有執行緒存取集合之前都鎖定的物件時才有效。Synchronization is effective only if all threads lock the object before accessing the collection. 取得這個屬性的值是 o （1） 運算。Getting the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列舉的目的而言，每個項目是結構。For purposes of enumeration, each item is a structure. `foreach` C# 語言的陳述式 (`for each` c + +`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of enumerators. 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 方法也會列舉值帶回至這個位置。The method also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在這個位置上， 並未定義。At this position, is undefined. 因此，您必須呼叫方法，以將列舉值前進到第一個項目，再讀取的值集合的。Therefore, you must call the method to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 屬性會傳回相同的物件直到或呼叫。The property returns the same object until either or is called. 會將 設定為下一個項目。 sets to the next element. 如果超過集合的列舉值的結尾會位於集合中的最後一個元素之後和傳回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 列舉值位於這個位置上，後續呼叫也會傳回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最後一個呼叫傳回`false`，是未定義。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 若要再次將 設定為集合的第一個元素，您可以在呼叫 之後，接著呼叫 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果變更集合，例如加入、 修改或刪除項目，列舉程式會永久失效，而且下次呼叫或會擲回。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權，因此，列舉集合內容本質上並不是安全的執行緒程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 命名空間中集合的預設實作未同步處理。Default implementations of collections in the namespace are not synchronized. 這個方法是 O (記錄 n) 運算，其中 n 是集合中的項目數目。This method is an O(log n) operation where n is a number of elements in a collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用列舉字典中的索引鍵/值組`foreach`陳述式 (`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中`for each`c + + 中)，這會隱藏列舉值使用。The following code example shows how to enumerate the key/value pairs in the dictionary by using the `foreach` statement (`For Each` in Visual Basic, `for each` in C++), which hides the use of the enumerator. 特別是，請注意，列舉程式介面傳回物件而非物件。In particular, note that the enumerator for the interface returns objects rather than objects. 程式碼範例是完整的範例，包括針對所提供的輸出的一部分方法。The code example is part of a larger example, including output, provided for the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有固定大小的集合不允許在集合建立後新增或移除項目，但允許對現有項目進行修改。A collection with a fixed size does not allow the addition or removal of elements after the collection is created, but it allows the modification of existing elements. 具有固定大小的集合是唯讀的集合只以防止新增或移除項目; 包裝函式因此，如果變更基礎的集合，包括新增或移除項目，固定大小的集合會反映這些變更。A collection with a fixed size is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents adding and removing elements; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, including the addition or removal of elements, the fixed-size collection reflects those changes. 取得這個屬性的值是 o （1） 運算。Getting the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 唯讀的集合不允許在集合建立後增加、移除或修改項目。A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created. 是唯讀的集合是唯讀的集合只具有可防止修改集合的包裝函式因此，如果基礎集合進行變更，唯讀的集合會反映這些變更。A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes. 取得這個屬性的值是 o （1） 運算。Getting the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會提供可以使用下列 C# 語法存取集合中的特定元素的能力： `myCollection[key]` (`myCollection(key)`在 Visual Basic 中)。This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following C# syntax: `myCollection[key]` (`myCollection(key)` in Visual Basic). 您也可以使用屬性所設定的值不存在的索引鍵的字典; 中加入新項目，例如`myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`。You can also use the property to add new elements by setting the value of a key that does not exist in the dictionary; for example, `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`. 不過，如果指定的索引鍵已經存在字典中，設定屬性會覆寫舊的值。However, if the specified key already exists in the dictionary, setting the property overwrites the old value. 相反地，方法不會修改現有的項目。In contrast, the method does not modify existing elements. C# 語言使用[這](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this.md)關鍵字定義索引，而不必實作屬性。The C# language uses the [this](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this.md) keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 會將 實作為預設屬性，這樣會提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality. 取得這個屬性的值為 O (記錄`n`) 作業; 設定該屬性也是 O (記錄`n`) 作業。Getting the value of this property is an O(log `n`) operation; setting the property is also an O(log `n`) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性 （C# 中為索引子）介面，以及方法的屬性與不同屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property (the indexer in C#) of the interface with a , and ways the property differs from the property. 此範例示範，例如屬性，屬性可以變更現有的索引鍵相關聯的值，而且可用來加入新的索引鍵/值組，如果指定的索引鍵不在字典中。The example shows that, like the property, the property can change the value associated with an existing key and can be used to add a new key/value pair if the specified key is not in the dictionary. 此範例也示範，不同於屬性，屬性不會擲回例外狀況如果`key`未在字典中，傳回 null 參考改為。The example also shows that unlike the property, the property does not throw an exception if `key` is not in the dictionary, returning a null reference instead. 最後，此範例會示範該取得屬性會傳回 null 參考，如果`key`不是正確的資料型別，並設定屬性擲回例外狀況，如果`key`不是正確的資料類型。Finally, the example demonstrates that getting the property returns a null reference if `key` is not the correct data type, and that setting the property throws an exception if `key` is not the correct data type. 程式碼範例是完整的範例，包括針對所提供的輸出的一部分方法。The code example is part of a larger example, including output, provided for the method. summary.span: 傳回逐一查看集合的列舉值。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `foreach` C# 語言的陳述式 (`for each` c + + `For Each` Visual Basic) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` Visual Basic) hides the complexity of enumerators. 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 此位置未定義屬性。At this position, the property is undefined. 因此，您必須呼叫方法，以將列舉值前進到第一個項目，再讀取的值集合的。Therefore, you must call the method to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 屬性會傳回相同的項目，直到方法呼叫。The property returns the same element until the method is called. 會將 設定為下一個項目。 sets to the next element. 如果超過集合的列舉值的結尾會位於集合中的最後一個元素之後和傳回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 列舉值位於這個位置上，後續呼叫也會傳回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最後一個呼叫傳回`false`，是未定義。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 您不能再次將 設定為集合的第一個項目；您必須建立新的列舉值執行個體。You cannot set to the first element of the collection again; you must create a new enumerator instance instead. 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果變更集合，例如加入、 修改或刪除項目，列舉程式會永久失效，而且下次呼叫或會擲回。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權，因此，列舉集合內容本質上並不是安全的執行緒程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 命名空間中集合的預設實作未同步處理。Default implementations of collections in the namespace are not synchronized. 這個方法是 O (記錄 n) 運算，其中 n 是集合中的項目數目。This method is an O(log n) operation where n is a number of elements in a collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會結合的功能方法和屬性。This method combines the functionality of the method and the property. 如果找不到索引鍵，然後在`value`參數可取得適當的預設值為實值型別`TValue`; 0 （零） 的整數類型，例如`false`針對布林類型，和`null`參考類型。If the key is not found, then the `value` parameter gets the appropriate default value for the value type `TValue`; for example, 0 (zero) for integer types, `false` for Boolean types, and `null` for reference types. 這個方法是 O (記錄`n`) 作業。This method is an O(log `n`) operation. ## Examples 此範例示範如何使用方法更有效率的方式來擷取在程式中，經常會嘗試不在字典中的索引鍵的值。The example shows how to use the method as a more efficient way to retrieve values in a program that frequently tries keys that are not in the dictionary. 相較之下，為此範例也示範如何屬性 （C# 中為索引子） 在嘗試擷取不存在的索引鍵時，會擲回例外狀況。For contrast, the example also shows how the property (the indexer in C#) throws exceptions when attempting to retrieve nonexistent keys. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
